message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value related to the total tax the entity is expected to pay or recover during the reporting period.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see there is a specific line item labeled "Tax Expense" with a value of 131850.51.

This is exactly what we're looking for - the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay during this reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '131850.51'} }
```
